channel.title: Lvl 3 and not an admin either?
channel.description:
i open up my database and go into characters and go into my character and change it to this:
[ACCOUNT] character-username = adjacent character-password = ********
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3110 character-posy = 3419 character-rights = 2 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-lastlogin = 20070310 character-energy = 9999999999999 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 712
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 0 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 0 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 0 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000000 character-skill = 3 99 14000000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000000
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF]
and i save it but it doesnt make a difference, please help!

item.title: Lvl 3 and not an admin either?
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

[quote=“foxfire60, post:3, topic:77946”]when i compile it says this:
javac is not a recognized
as an internal or external command
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue…

and when i push a key it exits, please help[/quote]
Go to my guide if that message appeared: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,112844.0.html
You may need to skip down a bit…
By the way 1= Mod 2= Admin 3= Owner.
Type in three for you, and exit out of the window that is running your server (Runserver). Save your Character notepad and then Compile. Now run your server again and it should work!

~Thanks, Mike

Read full topic
item.source: Lvl 3 and not an admin either?
